medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 10-year history of progressive exertional dyspnea that has become debilitating over the preceding 3 months, characterized by shortness of breath with subtle physical activities such as tying shoelaces.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rate-controlled atrial fibrillation, 90 pack-year tobacco use, dyslipidemia, systemic hypertension, type 2 diabetes mellitus, moderate chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, obstructive sleep apnea (not currently treated), gastrointestinal bleed caused by colon cancer (treated with hemicolectomy 11 years earlier).
medical_history.family_history: Father died at 55 years of age from myocardial infarction.
